Text: Use this tool to clean up any automation on buildings or construction sites.
Builders can't reach it yet, but a path is being constructed.
The builders can't find the way to this site. Maybe nothing can be constructed here.
Immediately finishes the selected buildable items.
Prints components on the selected object.
Use this tool to pause buildings and construction sites.
Use this tool to resume buildings and construction sites.
Some automation rules cannot be executed.
Waiting for the other buildings to finish.
Apply this template to floodgates that need to close when the bad tide begins.
Close the floodgate when the bad tide starts.
Apply this template to floodgates that need to open when the bad tide begins.
Open floodgate at the start of low tide.
Apply this template to buildings that should remain on hold during bad tides.
Apply this template to buildings that should operate as long as there are available beds.
Run until the beaver population reaches its maximum.
Apply this template to buildings that should remain paused until the beaver population decreases by 10 beavers below the current level.
Apply this template to buildings that should remain on hold until the beaver population decreases by 20 beavers below the current level.
Apply this template to buildings that should continue operating until the beaver population exceeds the current level by 10 beavers.
Apply this template to buildings that should be operational until the beaver population exceeds the current level by 20 beavers.
Apply this template to buildings that must remain paused until the bot population decreases by 10 beavers below the current level.
Apply this template to buildings that must remain paused until the bot population drops 20 beavers below the current level.
Apply this template to buildings that should remain operational until the bot population exceeds the current level by 10 bots.
Apply this template to buildings that should remain operational until the bot population surpasses the current level by 20 bots.
Apply this template to construction sites that may obstruct builders' paths. Note: Results are not guaranteed, especially if buildings are not at the same elevation.
Apply this template to floodgates that should close when a drought begins.
Close the floodgate as the drought begins.
Apply this template to floodgates that should open when a drought begins.
Apply this template to water flow control buildings (like <YellowHighlight>Badwater Dome</YellowHighlight> or <YellowHighlight>Sluice</YellowHighlight>) to keep them open during droughts.
Open water flow control during drought
Apply this template to buildings that should remain paused during droughts.
Automatically detonates the dynamite when the construction is complete. This template can be applied to a finished dynamite as well.
Apply this template to buildings that should emit a signal of the selected good amount in the storage. The signal can be used in conditions on the other buildings.
Empty the storage if the capacity is above 50%.
Empty the storage if the capacity is above 60%.
Empty the storage if the capacity is above 70%.
Empty the storage if the capacity is above 80%.
Empty the storage if capacity is above 90%.

This template can be applied to buildings that produce goods and have no input stock. If the output stock level exceeds the predetermined threshold, the building will transition into an 'empty' mode, facilitating rapid removal of goods.
Apply this template to floodgates to control their height in sync.
Apply this template to construction sites that should be paused once the construction progress reaches 100%.
Apply this template to buildings that should be prioritized by haulers once the construction is complete.
Apply this template to stream gauges that should emit a signal of the current water condition. The signals can be used in conditions on the other buildings.
Apply this template to floodgates that need to close when the temperate season starts.
Close floodgate on temperate weather start
Apply this template to floodgates that need to open when the temperate season starts.
Open floodgate when temperate weather begins.
Apply this template to buildings that should remain paused during temperate weather.
Apply this template to floodgates that should open by 0.5m of their maximum height when the temperate season begins.
Slightly open floodgate during mild weather

This template can be applied to dynamites, whether it is finished or still being built. Upon completion, the dynamite will detonate automatically, and a new dynamite blueprint will be placed to dig deeper.
detonate dynamite and add another <GreenHighlight>{0} times</GreenHighlight>
The storage is being emptied on a priority basis.
Condition must be a boolean expression.
Condition must contain at least one signal.
There are rules in the editing state. Complete them first.
Some rules have errors! Fix them first.
There are unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them?
Evaluate the correct value under the circumstances.
Evaluate values in the action arguments.
Check the argument value at runtime.
Check arguments with a fixed set of values.
Logs will have more useful details, but it may impact game performance.
Hold SHIFT to select items of one type only.
Point to an entity and click to start selecting.
